marklogic.body:
Yes, there are people who cannot avoid weight Gain (e.g. steroids) but they represent less than 10% of the obese population, and yes, yo-yo dieting and low-calorie dieting can be damaging but look at the context and the actions: there is still choice involved.
Emotional trauma and povertyÂ are horrible but eating poorly is not the solution for either: tackle the problem itself, and don't cover it up with something else like binge/poor eatingÂ that can become its own problem.
Most of these "reasons" are simply absurd excuses at best. I speak from personal first-hand experience and myself fight the weight problem almost every day.
